channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title:
🗒️He recibido DM para poder postear un gráfico tipo piramidal por grupos etarios 📊Aquí se los comparto a nivel nacional así como las regiones TOP3
#TomeNota la data se ha extraído del REUNIS del MINSA y no de los datos abiertos ya que en ésta existe un 10% sin edad registradas https://t.co/Kn6iGIIi4H

🙌Hoy llegaremos a 9MM aplicadas 🙌Mes de julio tiende a superar las 4.5MM aplicadas 🙌Promedio diario +160K📈 (cercano a los +175K de mediados de junio)
#OpenData 🇵🇪 Totales al 09/07: 8,930,921 Dosis#1: 5,363,808▶️19.7 C/100 de 27.2MM Dosis#2: 3,567,113▶️13.1 C/100 de 27.2MM https://t.co/FeVybOOTJP

Just like @Bitcoin is decentralized money, just like @ethereum is decentralized smart contracts, @graphprotocol is the first decentralized indexing and querying platform making open data a public good on top of blockchains.
Web3 has arrived 🌐👩‍🚀

Impressive national plan for open science in France. Open access, open data, open code, and making open science the default.
https://t.co/0rOc4qbonk

Nous n’avons toujours pas le nombre de cas, d’hospitalisations et de décès chez les vaccinés en 🇫🇷 alors que ces données sont disponibles aux 🇺🇸et au 🇬🇧. Il nous faut de la transparence et vite! #OpenData @cedric_o @olivierveran https://t.co/2c9fLBS3vc

EU innovators are like world-class chefs. They have the great ideas. Our job is to give them the equipment (#5G), the ingredients (open #data) and the facilities (#RRF) to bring those ideas to life. Great to be @3seaseu Summit: https://t.co/pLWW6LvBPU https://t.co/blkmUzGsqe

Multidimensional poverty is measured by income in addition to deprivation in dimensions like: ✏️Education 🚑Healthcare 💧Sanitation
How can countries start measuring multidimensional poverty? We worked with @UNDP @UNICEF to create new guidance: https://t.co/Kk1YmhAz3w https://t.co/UxXhZqjj5d

The amazingness of an open data community like #OSM is that it has something for everybody and every bit of data becomes important! It's not just about roads and key attributes like oneways! Bicycle data points are equally crucial! ✅🚴‍♀️ #addanykeypoint #sotm2021 #mapcomplete https://t.co/D4lVjpaxCN
Rama: Bashkitë të mos abuzojnë me tenderat. Open Data: Qeveria ka më shumë shkelje në tendera se bashkitë https://t.co/R4NTW4q875

Great to be part of @nadhimzahawi Connected Growth workshop @BigTentIdeas and discuss points on open data, regulation, & leading the way on sustainable manufacturing as well as make my plea to share the agility & partnership of the Vaccine Taskforce across Government! #BigTent21

แล้วมันยากหรอที่จะทำ open data ให้ประชาชนเข้าถึงข้อมูลพวกนี้แบบตปท.เค้าทำกัน มัวแต่หมกเม็ดข้อมูล กลัวสะท้อนผลของการบริหารที่ย่ำแย่ สุดท้ายประชาชนก็ขาดความเชื่อมั่นกับรัฐบาลยิ่งขึ้นไปอีก https://t.co/5kz18wamYj https://t.co/R2bM5SL4jO

ทีกับเมย์เดย์คณะก้าวหน้านะ เขากางสลิปแล้ว มีopendata อีสลิ่มมันแจ้งความบ้าง ทวงบ้าง ทั้งที่ตัวเองก็ไม่ได้บริจาค ช่วยแบบส่วนตัวๆก็ไม่ทำ พออีประเย็ดมันสละเงินเดือน ไหนคะความกระสันอยากตรวจสอบมันหายไปไหน รถพระราชทานตรวจโควิดฟรีมันทำไมต้องแย่งกัน เนี่ยยย ความขี้เสือกหายไปไหน

#Ojo Es un error asumir que restando el total de dosis reportados de un día con respecto al día anterior es la cantidad de dosis aplicadas en las últimas 24horas. Para validar ese número hay 2 formas: Vía #DatosAbiertos y en el mismo REUNIS del Minsa filtrando la fecha https://t.co/tO3V1fNBCD https://t.co/pQ3mgtxPsv

Over the past few years I sent out 10 "reasonable requests" for data/software ... 0.5 data sets received... Only conclusion: My requests must be unreasonable. #OpenScience #OpenData
Blender公式のCPU/GPU比較データ。3090と3080はレンダリング時間ではあんまり大差ないから3080がコスパ的に優れてる風に見えるけど、VRAM容量が全然違うから作業感は結構違うのではないかと（個人的にはレンダリングより作業の軽快さの方が大事だと思う） https://t.co/69LSA8jpN8

.@SaludDeportesBo pedimos #datosabiertos de la vacunación por municipio. Serían de un gran beneficio para la planificación, toma de decisiones y una mayor comprensión de la pandemia https://t.co/uSeNfNj0wX

"You can’t build it once and call it done. Anything we build needs to be maintained and adapted to stay relevant to the world around it." Read about the current (and 4th!) OC rebuild #archaeology #opendata https://t.co/idpYl0X1wc

From today Nextstrain will also run regular @nextstrain builds on INSDC @NCBI Genbank, parallel to the GISAID runs. Because this is #opendata, we are also able to share intermediate files as starting points for others' work! #openscience
Read more here: https://t.co/j9h0GE5V1J https://t.co/FPwHv8bjcP

Comme promis, @education_gouv a publié en open-data la carte scolaire pour les collèges publics. Il manque les informations pour 19 départements parce qu'ils n'avaient pas intégré les données dans Affelnet ou qu'elles n'étaient pas assez fiables. https://t.co/bjFV2XfZD2

However, going forward from today we are mirroring these GISAID-based workflows with "Open Data" workflows using data from @NCBI GenBank. GenBank now contains over 800k SARS-CoV-2 genomes, but has less geographic coverage compared to GISAID. 2/4 https://t.co/LCqP1TeU2W

Damos inicio a nuestro webinar sobre los aportes del informe de gobernanza cultural y datos abiertos con @SilvanavF, @jatenas, @maudelfin y Melika Medici. Facebook: https://t.co/mw8vM004My YouTube: https://t.co/4A5Yuoayod

The freeCodeCamp community just launched our 2021 New Coder Survey.
🎭 It's anonymous 🏗️ All questions are optional 💽 We'll publish the full dataset as open data
If you started learning to code in the past 5 years, help by taking this ~10 minute survey. https://t.co/itKB1tOh21

Excellent collaboration with MQ team, to make @maxquant submissions from MaxDIA COMPLETE in @pride_ebi . We also extended the HUPO-PSI formats to support DIA experiments. https://t.co/AmbGP4nHS1 #OpenData #standards

El enfoque de #GobiernoAbierto debe ampliar su alcance a diversas esferas, entre ellas a la gobernanza cultural y uso de #DatosAbiertos. Recomiendo este interesante estudio de @maudelfin sobre el tema: https://t.co/01PSN0XYWm @GIGAPP @RIGA_LATAM @opengovpart #OpenCulture #OpenGov https://t.co/oQTWmytE19

¿Por qué para acceder a un evento de Datos Abiertos del gobierno hay que registrarse y hay que hacerlo a través de una aplicación privativa que almacena tus datos? En el 'GobiernoDelEncuentro' alguien no se ha encontrado con el concepto de «abierto» #OpenData https://t.co/n1mqoXHAdZ
Vielen Dank für die Gelegenheit, mit @CorrelaidxKN an der @UniKonstanz über #OpenData, #DataLiteracy und #Data4Good sprechen zu dürfen! https://t.co/jPsT8TLtAy

@xsaezll @LuisEAlfaroM @MINSAPma @CSSPanama @aigesinnovacion Eso no es técnicamente complejo, un tablero con esas gráficas. El problema es el acceso a datos para hacer esos reportes, necesitamos más OPEN DATA

We are excited to present @CorrelaidxKN today at the Advanced Data and Information Literacy Track (ADILT) from @UniKonstanz today! Stay tuned for presentations from @ameisen_strasse, @Leeleko, @bosch_phil, and @LukasBirkenmai1 on #Data4Good, #DataLiteracy and #OpenData #Konstanz https://t.co/RDPcHTD0HT

A new Statistical Report in @ESAEcology:
Undersampling correction methods to control γ-dependence for comparing β-diversity between regions
With #OpenData in @datadryad
#BetaDiversity #Undersampling #DiversityIndices
https://t.co/96bjpdTAce https://t.co/d8wjAabAzP
One of the things that I really appreciate about the growing norm of open data/code is that I can look at someone's code to see how they estimated a model when I'm learning about that model.

While looking through the new violence reduction dashboard the city put out, I was surprised that all of the underlying data was post on the #OpenData portal... I cannot state the importance of this. https://t.co/QWBATh2aiM

After many years in the making this is finally out today in @NatureComms ! "Different environmental variables predict body and brain size evolution in Homo" (title says it all!). https://t.co/sdoIZ19NFm #evolution #anthropology #Archaeology #openaccess #OpenData

El Plan Ciencia Abierta Francia 2021-24 incorpora software abierto (código propietario debe ser excepcional), publicación "diamante" (acceso abierto puro), datos abiertos, y (comme d'habitude) multilingüismo. Merece reseña Blok @revistaBiD asap. Allez hi! https://t.co/Hoik930VQz
